name: geogebra-lint
description: A linting engine for GeoGebra scripts

scripts.demo: npm run build && node scripts/cli.js tests/fixtures/example.ggb
scripts.demo:lint: npm run build && npx ts-node tests/lint-example.ts
scripts.demo:web: npm run build:browser && start http://localhost:8080/tests/web-demo.html && python -m http.server 8080
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && npx ts-node tests/integration-test.ts

author: Ivory
